title: Food and Drinks 2
sentences: Do you (formal) have a table for two people?
I would like to see the menu.
Do you (informal) want to share an appetizer?
For the main course, I'll take the steak.
I would like a sparkling mineral water.
Can we have the bill, please?
Stimmt so, das ist für den
Keep the change, that is for the service.
Do you (formal) prefer eating sweet or salty?
This soup is too spicy for me.
I am full, I can't eat anything else.
I am thirsty, I would like to drink something, please.
Do you (formal) drink your coffee with cream?
I am ordering a pizza Margarita.
We are drinking a bottle of white wine.
Is this seat here still free?
I would like to pay in cash.
Do you (formal) also take credit cards?
I would like a still water.
Ich esse zum Frühstück oft ein
I often eat an egg for breakfast.
dictionary:
der Tisch - table
die Speisekarte - menu
empfehlen - to recommend
das Tagesgericht - daily special
die Vorspeise - appetizer
die Hauptspeise - main course
das Mineralwasser - mineral water (sparkling)
die Rechnung - bill
der Service - service
süß - sweet
scharf - spicy
der Nachtisch / das Dessert - dessert
satt - full (not hungry)
der Hunger - hunger
der Durst - thirst
die Sahne - cream
die Pizza - pizza
das Hähnchen - chicken
der Weißwein - white wine
der Kellner - waiter
der Platz - place / seat
bezahlen - to pay
die Kreditkarte - credit card
das Essen - food / meal
Guten Appetit - enjoy your meal
das Stille Wasser - still water
die Zitrone - lemon
das Ei - egg
die Freundschaft - friendship
